Jonas Ribe

Archive Projects About




My name is Jonas Ribe. I am a PhD-candidate in biophysics at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology. I do research in the field of lab-on-a-chip devices - making microchips which can automate tasks in biomedicine for point-of-care diagnostics.

I am also the developer of Highlights, a Mac app for extracting PDF annotations to Markdown.

This is a Jekyll website with static content written in Markdown. The website is hosted on GitHub pages. The design is done using the Twitter Bootstrap framework. The icons are from Font Awesome by Dave Gandy.

© 2014 Jonas Ribe
